title: What is the difference between mathematics and natural science? - Quora

response.answer_text: The philosophical difference between math and science. Contemporary society lumps math and science as one thing, but they are not the same. ... The basis ofscience is empiricism. One observes something about the natural world, and tries to create their own model of how it works or occurs—. The difference between Mathematics & Science is the same as the difference between a Language & a Sentence. Empirical scientists study observables. ... Mathematics is the study of patterns.
